thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com | 34 2
thread.title: Norman Stewart
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Norman Stewart

author: Norman Stewart
title: Norman Stewart
text: I have order a handful of items from Tomtop and i have not had a problem as of yet. Everything went smoothly and the items arrived at my door in very good time. i have a couple of other things on their way. Recommend Tomtop...Hell yes. We all have to remember that a lot of the things we order come from very far away. Anything can happen while in transit that might slow the delivery down or get the item lost. Not Tomtop's fault. These things happen. Even at your door. The product is delivered to your door, someone else see's this and it gets taken. It happens and it can happen to anyone. Its the chance you take when ordering online as i do and will continue to do.
